title: Minisode: Mindy and Mary’s Top 10 Books of 2021
itunes:title: Minisode: Mindy and Mary’s Top 10 Books of 2021
description:
Today's minisode has an additional top 10 list to add to your 2022 TBRs! We’ve got Mindy and Mary here with their favorite books of 2021, and their conversation is not-to-be-missed! Note that they recorded this episode before Meredith and Kaytee’s released, so there are some repeats, but no one knew about the other’s lists!

Minisode show notes are not timestamped, but linked titles are below for you to peruse. 

*Please note that all book titles linked below are Bookshop affiliate links. Your cost is the same, but a small portion of your purchase will come back to us to help offset the costs of the show. If you’d prefer to shop on Amazon, you can still do so here through our main storefront. Anything you buy there (even your dishwasher detergent!) kicks a small amount back to us. Thanks for your support!*

.

.

.

.

Mindy and Mary’s Top 10 Books of 2021

The Bridge Home by Padma Venkatraman (Mindy)

The Anthropocene Reviewed by John Green (Mary)

The Serpent King by Jeff Zentner

In the Wild Light by Jeff Zentner (Mindy)

Long Bright River by Liz Moore

Pony by R.J. Palacio (Mary)

Goodnight Beautiful by Aimee Malloy (Mindy)

One Last Stop by Casey McQuiston (Mary)

Red, White, and Royal Blue by Casey McQuiston

All Systems Red by Martha Wells (Mindy)

The Firekeeper’s Daughter by Angeline Boulley (Mary)

The Marrow Thieves by Cherie Dimaline (Mindy)

The House in the Cerulean Sea by TJ Klune (Mary)

The Devotion of Suspect X by Keigo Higashino (Mindy)

Magic Lessons by Alice Hoffman (Mary)

Razorblade Tears by S.A. Cosby (Mindy)

Six of Crows by Leigh Bardugo (Mary)

A Place for Us by Fatima Farheen Mirza (Mindy)

I Hope This Finds You Well by Kate Baer (Mary)

These Silent Woods by Kimi Cunningham Grant (Mary & Mindy!)

Project Hail Mary by Andy Weir (Mindy)

The Sentence by Louise Erdrich (Mary)

Connect With Us:

Meredith is @meredith.reads on Instagram

Kaytee is @notesonbookmarks on Instagram

Mindy is @gratefulforgrace on Instagram

Mary is @maryreadsandsips on Instagram

currentlyreadingpodcast.com

@currentlyreadingpodcast on Instagram

currentlyreadingpodcast@gmail.com

Support us at patreon.com/currentlyreadingpodcast
